metadata.title: Oded Winberger | Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in modern web and software technologies

hero.name: Oded Winberger
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I build digital experiences with modern web technologies

iGarten.title: iGarten
iGarten.description: iGarten is my version of personal software. It allows you to keep track of your plants, their needs, and your gardening tasks. I use it to keep track of my garden and it's been a great help. At the end of the day, it is just another to-do list, but it is a fun and useful project to work on.

dialektli.title: Dialektli
dialektli.description: Dialektli is a fun project I'm working on to learn more about the different dialects in Switzerland. Aims to be a platform where people can share their favorite dialect words and phrases, and learn about the different dialects in Switzerland. It's a work in progress, but I'm excited to see where it goes.

solr.title: Solr
solr.description: Solr is a neat little guide of our solar system. It's got this gallery showing the sun and all the planets, and a 3D model showing how the planets revolve around the sun with the ability to adjust the size of the sun and the planets to grasp the sheer size of the solar system.

geochat.title: GeoChat
geochat.description: GeoChat is a location-based chat application that allows users to chat with others in their vicinity. It was a fun project to work on, and I learned a lot about websockets and geolocation.

landpro.title: LandPro
landpro.description: In 2021, I had a defining moment with LandPro, as it led me to embrace programming as a career path. It was a great ride.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: Download my resume to learn more about me.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to chat? Please do reach out!
